betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Despite all their rules, the Ancient Fractallites were luckily pushover fighters.
What is most remarkable about them, though, is their homeworld. It reminds of the pocket spaces I built using fluix to house my factories back at the start of my adventures on Terra. The Ancient Cavern is the result of an insane amount of magic, and yet fluix can achieve the same result with much less effort, from the hands of someone who is barely capable of magic, as I was back then.
What the Arbiter so easily and freely left on Terra, to be mostly snubben in front of Dimensional Shards, is quite astonishing to me. Yes sure, to be able of harnessing the power of Fluix you need a physiscs knowhow, but still, it is amazing what the Arbiter's technology is capable of.
I have big shoes to fill...
